LightningComponentBundle.description: A simple utility for displaying Visualforce based PDF documents.

property.name: url
property.label: Visualforce Page URL
property.description: Specifies the Visualforce Page address of the document to be displayed.

property.name: height
property.label: Height
property.description: Specifies the height of the PFD viewer. Default height is 500 pixels.

property.name: width
property.label: Width
property.description: Specifies the width of the PFD viewer. Default width is 100 percent.
